description: PiezoMotor Uppsala AB develops and manufactures micro motors based on piezoelectric materials. The company is headquartered in Uppsala, Uppsala and currently employs 39 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-06-09. The firm operates as a developer and manufacturer of micro motors based on piezoelectric materials.The Company' motors replace traditional technology and enable motorization where it was not possible before. The motors’ performance include sub-nanometer positioning as well as high force in a small package. The motors can operate in vacuum and can be made completely non-magnetic. The firm's products portfolio includes rotary motors, linear motors, drive electronics, encoders, software, among others. The firm is primarily focused on such industries, as medical and life science, optics and semiconductors, aerospace and defense, among others.
naicsSubsector: Electrical Equipment, Appliance, and Component Manufacturing
name: PiezoMotor Uppsala publ AB
